code: export var ADD_ONE="ADD_ONE";export var APPLY_NUMBER="APPLY_NUMBER";export var CHANGE_OPERATION="CHANGE_OPERATION";export var CLEAR_DISPLAY="CLEAR_DISPLAY";export var MEMORY_ADD="MEMORY_ADD";export var MEMORY_CLEAR="MEMORY_CLEAR";export var MEMORY_RECALL="MEMORY_RECALL";export var addOne=function addOne(){return{type:ADD_ONE};};export var applyNumber=function applyNumber(number){return{type:APPLY_NUMBER,payload:number};};export var operationChange=function operationChange(operation){return{type:CHANGE_OPERATION,payload:operation};};export var clearDisplay=function clearDisplay(){return{type:CLEAR_DISPLAY};};export var memoryAdd=function memoryAdd(){return{type:MEMORY_ADD};};export var memoryClear=function memoryClear(){return{type:MEMORY_CLEAR};};export var memoryRecall=function memoryRecall(){return{type:MEMORY_RECALL};};
